mapper.select: SELECT t0.resource_code FROM dwk_resource_binding t0 LEFT JOIN dwk_resource t1 ON t1.id = t0.binding_resource_id LEFT JOIN dwk_resource t2 ON t2.id = t0.resource_id WHERE t1.CODE = 'storageLocation' AND t2.CODE = 'warehouse' AND t0.binding_resource_code =#{locationCode} AND t0.is_delete = 0 limit 1
